version.description: Version number which must be provided in order to handle and detect concurrent changes to the node content.

language.description: ISO 639-1 language tag of the node which provides the image which should be transformed.

focalPoint.description: Optional new focal point for the transformed image.

x.description: The horizontal position of the focal point. The value is a factor of the image width. The value 0.5 is the center of the image.

y.description: The vertical position of the focal point. The value is a factor of the image height. The value 0.5 is the center of the image.
